post.title: ECMAScript 2015 (ES6) Presentation
post.excerpt: Links to the presentation and samples
post.content:
This is an old post from my blog: https://miroslavpopovic.com/posts/2015/03/ecmascript-2015-es6-presentation

Ten days ago, I held a talk "ECMAScript 2015 (ES6)" on our local user group meeting. Slides on English and Serbian language, with examples, can be found here: http://miroslavpopovic.github.io/ecmascript6/.

Thanks to all who attended.
